name: Podcast Creatio
what_you_do: Fame offers a free podcast course that teaches individuals how to grow their podcasts effectively, based on their successful experience of increasing a client's podcast downloads from zero to 140,000 per month.
who_you_serve: They serve B2B businesses and individuals interested in podcasting, particularly those looking to generate qualified leads and establish a presence in their niche.
bio: Grew a client podcast to 140,000 downloads per month and ranked #5 in the Medicine Category in Apple Podcasts in the US.
business_focus: Fame offers a free podcast course that teaches individuals how to grow their podcasts effectively, based on their successful experience of increasing a client's podcast downloads from zero to 140,000 per month. (podcasting)
